text: mariyu musa memu nirnayincina samayaniki (ma nirnita cotuku) vaccinapudu, atani prabhuvu atanito matladadu. (Musa) annadu: "O na prabhu! Naku ni darsana bhagyamivvu (kanipincu). Nenu ninnu cudadalacanu!" (Allah) annadu: "Nivu nannu (e matram) cudalevu! Kani i parvatam vaipuku cudu! Okavela adi tana sthananlo sthiranga undagaligite, appudu nivu nannu cudagalavanuko!" Atani prabhuvu a kondapai tana tejas'sunu prasarimpajeyaga adi bhasmamai poyindi mariyu musa sprha tappi padipoyadu. Telivi vaccina taruvata (musa) annadu: "Nivu sarvalopalaku atitudavu, nenu pascattapanto ni vaipuku maralu tunnanu mariyu nenu visvasincevarilo mottamodati vadanu
